entry.title: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
entry.content:
Feb 8, 02:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 8, 02:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 7, 05:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/02/2024 01:00 UTC
End time : 08/02/2024 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Spanish Interconnect will be unreachable during the network maintenance, incoming and outgoing call for Spanish customers will not be possible.
Related incident : Incident link
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade a network equipment.

entry.title: [EU][WebCloud] - MXPlan incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 7, 17:53 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/02/2024 17:10 UTC
End time : 07/02/2024 17:20 UTC
Service impact : Unavailability on the platform that send mail (causing retry later)
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster011/Cluster027
entry.content:
Feb 7, 10:34 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/02/2024 09:10 UTC
End time : 07/02/2024 10:27 UTC
Service impact : Customer may encountered some latencies or unavailability on there websites hosted on Cluster011 and Cluster027
Root cause : A network overload caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 7, 10:13 UTC
Update - No more impact is being observed on Cluster027.
Our teams are currently working to solve the issue for Cluster011.

Feb 7, 09:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/02/2024 09:10 UTC
Service impact : Customer can encounter some latencies or unavailability on there websites hosted on Cluster011 and Cluster027
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Databases eu008/0009
entry.content:
Feb 7, 03:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/02/2024 02:17 UTC
End time : 07/02/2024 03:06 UTC
Service impact : Some servers were unreachable
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
